text: Jwalakwe ni Jwandanda (pangali chilichose paujo Pakwe), soni Jwambesi (pangali chilichose panyuma Pakwe), soni Jwapenani kusyene (pangali chilichose pachanya Pakwe), soni Jwakuwandika nnope (ni umanyilisyi Wakwe, pangali chakuwandika nnope kupunda Jwalakwe), soni Jwalakwe chindu chilichose juwele Jwaachimanya chenene
